title: [LFM] need a supp and jg
body: Just started a new ranked team called VB esports need a supp and jg  if you would like to join add me G0LD3NB0Y or just leave a comment with your IGN

replies.body:
Hi i can play top/mid/jg if its needed

Plat 5/Spaghini

Add me if interested

Hi

Me and my friend want to join. Our position is supp and jungle

IGN: Krait Kin
Role: Main Jungle (Flexible)

IGN: Lemon
Role : Support (Flexible)

We can play almost everyday

Glad if we can join your team.
Krait r u any good at mid cause we need a new mid
I can mid I'm b2 but have positive kda on my champs
Hmm i'm not really good but i can ask Lemon because i'm more supportive/tank role

Support main, i guess i'm looking for a team.
Well, i'm not really, i don't play much ranked - mainly 'cause i prefer playing with premades than alone. So what i'm saying is, i'm looking for a team.

You won't find ranked statistics, i moved server recently. Count me as a very lazy low Gold (or, more properly, "finally, 10 games played! what did i get? silver I? Eh, whatever, i'll just keep the border")
Im ranked silver 5 and i can jungle if you would like!
